page.title: 05TOURISM
page.content: Haddington does not cater much for the tourist; facilities such as parks providing leisure pursuits are lacking. On the other hand, for those who are interested in local history there are{284}listed historical buildings,the top ten being : { { 1. St.Mary's Parish Church}- one of the largest churches built in the 14th and 15th centuries. { 2.}Knox Institute. { 3.}Town House. { 4.}The Cross. { 5.}The Doocot,Lady Kitty's Garden. { 6.}Old West Kirk. { 7.}Mitchell's Close. { 8.}Jane Welsh Carlyle Museum. { 9.}Haddington House. {10.}Kinloch House.
